dict.string: First, the list is divided into two sublists.
Continue to divide the sublist to the left into halves.
When the number of elements of the sublist is one, the division is complete.
Now, two child sublists are combined. While being combined, these numbers are put in order from smallest to largest.
Continue to merge the two sublists on the left.
Again, divide the sublist to the right into halves.
When the number of elements of the sublist is one, the division is complete.
Now, two child sublists are combined.
Continue to merge the two sublists on the right.
Continue to merge the two child sublists until we have a fully sorted list.
